languages.text: "Лорд-инквизитор предупредил, что Ваша Светлость будет интересоваться этим. Он дал мне {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}инструкцию{/d}". {n}Лицо слуги расслабляется, словно у спящего, а в голосе возникают рокочущие нотки Калькасара:{/n} "Ваша Светлость, сожалею, что мы не смогли поговорить. Дело особой важности вынудило меня покинуть Футфол".

"The Lord Inquisitor warned me that Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship would enquire about that. He left me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}instructions{/d}." {n}The servant's face relaxes, as though he has fallen asleep. What he says next carries an echo of Calcazar's rumbling voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I regret that we never spoke. A matter of special importance has forced me to leave Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-инквизитор предупредил, что Ваша Светлость будет интересоваться этим. Он дал мне {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}инструкцию{/d}". {n}Лицо слуги расслабляется, словно у спящего, а в голосе возникают рокочущие нотки Калькасара:{/n} "Ваша Светлость, сожалею, что мы не смогли поговорить. Дело особой важности вынудило меня покинуть Футфол".

What he says next carries an echo of Calcazar's rumbling voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I regret that we never spoke. A matter of special importance has forced me to leave Footfall."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: “大审判官告诉过我，说大人您应该回来询问此事。他给我留下了{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}特别指示{/d}。”{n}仆人的表情放松下来，似乎睡着了一样，随后以类似于卡尔卡扎的低沉声音开了口。{/n}“大人，我很遗憾没能有机会与你交谈。发生了非常重要的事情，我不得不立刻离开落脚港。”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor warned me that Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship would enquire about that. He left me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}instructions{/d}." {n}The servant's face relaxes, as though he has fallen asleep. What he says next carries an echo of Calcazar's rumbling voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I regret that we never spoke. A matter of special importance has forced me to leave Footfall."

traits.locale_text: “审判长告诉过我，说大人您应该回来询问此事。他给我留下了特别指示。”{n}仆人的表情放松下来，似乎睡着了一样，接下来以近乎卡尔卡扎的低沉声音开了口。{/n}“大人，我很遗憾没能有机会与你交谈。发生了非常重要的事情，我不得不立刻离开落脚港。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: 「陛下がこの件についてお聞きになるだろうと、ロード・インクィジターに忠告されていました。その際の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}指示{/d}も与えられております」{n}召使は眠りに就くかのように、顔のこわばりを解く。次に続いた言葉は、まるでカルカサルのブツブツという声のようだった。{/n}「陛下、今までお話する機会がなかったこと、残念に思います。特別に重要な案件がありまして、フットフォールから去らざるを得なくなったのです」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor warned me that Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship would enquire about that. He left me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}instructions{/d}." {n}The servant's face relaxes, as though he has fallen asleep. What he says next carries an echo of Calcazar's rumbling voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I regret that we never spoke. A matter of special importance has forced me to leave Footfall."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下がこの件についてお聞きになるだろうと、ロード・インクィジターに忠告されていました。その際の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}指示{/d}も与えられております」{n}召使は眠りに就くかのように、顔のこわばりを解く。次に続いた言葉は、まるでカルカサルのブツブツという声のようだった。{/n}「陛下、今までお話する機会がなかったこと、残念に思います。特別に重要な案件がありまして、フットフォールから去らざるを得なくなったのです」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: «El Lord Inquisidor me advirtió de que mi{mf|lord|lady} preguntaría sobre eso. Me dejó {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}instrucciones{/d}». {n}El rostro del sirviente se relaja, como si se hubiera quedado dormido. Lo que dice a continuación suena con la voz resonante de Calcazar.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, lamento que no hayamos hablado. Un asunto de especial importancia me ha obligado a abandonar Paso».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor warned me that Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship would enquire about that. He left me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}instructions{/d}." {n}The servant's face relaxes, as though he has fallen asleep. What he says next carries an echo of Calcazar's rumbling voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I regret that we never spoke. A matter of special importance has forced me to leave Footfall."

traits.locale_text: «El Lord Inquisidor me advirtió de que mi{mf|lord|lady} preguntaría sobre eso. Me dejó instrucciones». {n}El rostro del sirviente se relaja, como si se hubiera quedado dormido. Lo que dice a continuación suena con la voz resonante de Calcazar.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, lamento que no hayamos hablado. Un asunto de especial importancia me ha obligado a abandonar Paso».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Der Großinquisitor hat mich gewarnt, dass Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} danach fragen würde. Er hat mir {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}Anweisungen{/d} hinterlassen." {n}Das Gesicht des Dieners entspannt sich, als sei er eingeschlafen. Was er als Nächstes sagt, trägt ein Echo von Calcazars grollender Stimme in sich.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich bedauere es, dass wir uns nie unterhalten haben. Ich sah mich wegen einer Angelegenheit von besonderer Bedeutung gezwungen, Footfall zu verlassen."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor warned me that Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship would enquire about that. He left me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}instructions{/d}." {n}The servant's face relaxes, as though he has fallen asleep. What he says next carries an echo of Calcazar's rumbling voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I regret that we never spoke. A matter of special importance has forced me to leave Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Der Großinquisitor hat mich gewarnt, dass Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} danach fragen würde. Er hat mir Anweisungen hinterlassen." {n}Das Gesicht des Dieners entspannt sich, als wäre er eingeschlafen. Was er als Nächstes sagt, trägt ein Echo von Calcazars grollender Stimme in sich.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich bedauere es, dass wir uns nie unterhalten haben. Ich sah mich wegen einer Angelegenheit von besonderer Bedeutung gezwungen, Footfall zu verlassen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: « Le seigneur inquisiteur m'a prévenu que Votre Seigneurie dirait cela et m'a donné des {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}instructions{/d}. »{n}Les traits du serviteur se détendent comme s'il s'était soudain endormi. Lorsqu'il reprend la parole, c'est la voix grondante de Calcazar qui s'adresse à vous :{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, je regrette que nous n'ayons pas eu l'occasion de discuter. Une affaire de la plus haute importance m'a forcé à quitter Castel. »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor warned me that Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship would enquire about that. He left me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}instructions{/d}." {n}The servant's face relaxes, as though he has fallen asleep. What he says next carries an echo of Calcazar's rumbling voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I regret that we never spoke. A matter of special importance has forced me to leave Footfall."

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur inquisiteur m'a prévenu que Votre Seigneurie dirait cela et m'a donné des instructions. » {n}Les traits du serviteur se détendent comme s'il s'était soudain endormi. Lorsqu'il reprend la parole, c'est la voix grondante de Calcazar qui s'adresse à vous :{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, je regrette que nous n'ayons pas eu l'occasion de discuter. Une affaire de la plus haute importance m'a forcé à quitter Castel. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu, zatıaliniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin bu soruyu soracağı hususunda beni tembihlemişti. Bana {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}talimatlar{/d} bıraktı." {n}Hizmetkârın yüzü, uykuya dalmış gibi gevşiyor. Sonrasında sarf ettiği sözler, Calcazar'ın gürleyen sesiyle yankılanıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, maalesef konuşamadık. Hayli mühim bir meseleden ötürü Binliman'dan ayrılmak zorunda kaldım."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor warned me that Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship would enquire about that. He left me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_XavierTrust}instructions{/d}." {n}The servant's face relaxes, as though he has fallen asleep. What he says next carries an echo of Calcazar's rumbling voice.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I regret that we never spoke. A matter of special importance has forced me to leave Footfall."
